name: testValidateUserCredentials
description: Unit test to verify that user credentials are properly validated against the authentication system
purpose: Verify that the validateCredentials method correctly identifies valid and invalid user credentials
acceptance: Method returns true for valid credentials and false for invalid credentials, with appropriate logging

name: testPasswordEncryption
description: Unit test to ensure passwords are encrypted using the correct algorithm and salt
purpose: Validate that password encryption follows security standards and produces consistent results
acceptance: Encrypted password matches expected hash format and can be verified against original password

name: testDatabaseConnectionHandling
description: Unit test for database connection establishment and error handling
purpose: Ensure database connections are properly established and handle connection failures gracefully
acceptance: Connection succeeds with valid parameters, throws appropriate exceptions for invalid parameters

name: testUserInputValidation
description: Unit test to validate user input sanitization and validation rules
purpose: Verify that all user inputs are properly sanitized to prevent injection attacks
acceptance: Invalid inputs are rejected with clear error messages, valid inputs pass through unchanged

name: testSessionManagement
description: Unit test for user session creation, validation, and cleanup
purpose: Ensure user sessions are properly managed throughout the application lifecycle
acceptance: Sessions are created with unique IDs, expire after timeout, and are properly cleaned up

name: testConfigurationLoader
description: Unit test for application configuration loading and parsing
purpose: Validate that application configuration is loaded correctly from various sources
acceptance: Configuration values are loaded with correct types and defaults are applied when values are missing
